summary: A luckless architect discovers a social activist to be his lucky charm. Unfortunately, she's protecting the community center he's aiming to win a contract to tear down.
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Vidya Balan|Vishal Malhotra|Om Puri|Himani Shivpuri|Haidar Ali|Shehnaz Anand|Juhi Chawla|Karanvir Bohra|Amit Varma|Dimple Sharma|Hyder Ali|Boman Irani|Shah Rukh Khan|Liliia Sverginsky|Shahnaz Vahanvaty
title: Kismat Konnection
